alert.note: Alert for Forsyth (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 19 at 12:48PM EDT until June 19 at 1:15PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: The National Weather Service in Raleigh has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Forsyth County in central North Carolina... * Until 115 PM EDT. * At 1247 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Germanton, or 7 miles southwest of Walnut Cove, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Winston-Salem, Kernersville, Walkertown, Rural Hall, Stanleyville, Pfafftown, Sedge Garden, Belews Creek and Belews Lake. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
